name: Darkness Energy
effect: If the Pokémon Darkness Energy is attached to does damage with an attack (after applying Weakness and Resistance), the attack does 10 more damage. At the end of every turn, put 1 damage counter on the Pokémon Darkness Energy is attached to, unless it’s {D} or has Dark in its name. Darkness Energy provides {D} Energy. (Doesn’t count as a basic Energy card.)
author: Milky Isobe
